title: Spicy Stir-Fried Chicken
ingredients: ['2 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets, diced', '1 tablespoon chilli powder, divided', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 green pepper, chopped', '1 small onion, chopped', '2 green chillies, seeded and minced', '1 large tomato, cut into chunks']
